title: Sound Recording Bug Pixel 4A
content:
Most times I record audio with my 4A, I play it back and it plays back choppy and as if on 2x speed. It is not just on a specific app it is across all voice recording apps. However call voices are fine.
I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling voice recording apps but it persists.
I have not been able to find others with this bug and it has been consistent since I've received the phone.
